posts.text: Recount the states he won. Nice how we can pick and choose where the fraud was. Cling to that power while you still can, little man. You'll be a guest on Alex Jones in no time!
Why arent they teaching kids about Jesus? Thanks for the epiphany, prepubescent pizza face!
Move to another country. Everyone here's moving to Alaska.
Just need to fabricate now that we have permission. Quick! Pay some Shmoe to lie about participating in any way! ThE tRUtTh WiLl Be ReVeAlEAd!
Masters of pejorative terms! Pulled out from the 1920s! Y'know this was around the same time as another virus that never existed! /s
You're obviously not....so you did it.
"Do we kiss grandma extra hard since this is her last Thanksgiving?"
